Title: The Legend of Tarzan
Overview: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, Dark Horse Entertainment, Jerry Weintraub Productions, RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Beagle Pug Films, Riche Productions, Village Roadshow Films North America
Cast: Alexander Skarsgård, Margot Robbie, Christoph Waltz
